post.summary: Authenticates the client and generates a JWT token

requestBody.description: The authentication request containing client ID and client secret.

schema.description: Represents the request used for authentication.

200.description: Successfully authenticated and returned a JWT token.

schema.description: Represents the response returned after successful authentication.

tokenType.description: The type of the token, typically "bearer".

expiresIn.description: The number of seconds until the token expires.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong on the server.

schema.description: Represents the overall details of a shipment.

trackingNumber.description: A unique code assigned by the shipping company to monitor and trace the shipment’s progress.

sender.description: Represents the contact and address details of the sender.

name.description: The name of the person or company sending the shipment.

email.description: The email address of the person or company sending the shipment.

phone.description: The phone number of the person or company sending the shipment. The phone number should be in international format, starting with a + followed by the country code, then the area code and local number.

secondPhone.description: An additional phone number of the person or company sending the shipment.

countryCode.description: The country code of the address, typically in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format. For a full list of country codes, see the ISO website www.iso.org/obp/ui/#search

state.description: The state or region of the address.

postCode.description: The postal code or ZIP code of the address.

city.description: The city name of the address.

line1.description: The first line of the address, typically including street name and number.

line2.description: The second line of the address, typically used for additional information such as apartment or suite number.

line3.description: The third line of the address, often used for further details if needed.

receiver.description: Represents the contact and address details of the receiver.

name.description: The name of the person or company receiving the shipment.

email.description: The email address of the person or company receiving the shipment.

phone.description: The phone number of the person or company receiving the shipment. The phone number should be in international format, starting with a + followed by the country code, then the area code and local number.

secondPhone.description: An additional phone number of the person or company receiving the shipment.

countryCode.description: The country code of the address, typically in ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format. For a full list of country codes, see the ISO website www.iso.org/obp/ui/#search

state.description: The state or region of the address.

postCode.description: The postal code or Zip Code of the address.

city.description: The city name of the address.

line1.description: The first line of the address, typically including street name and number.

line2.description: The second line of the address, typically used for additional information such as apartment or suite number.

line3.description: The third line of the address, often used for further details if needed.

details.description: Represents the detailed information about a shipment.

weight.description: The weight provided by the customer or the volumetric or gross weight, whichever is higher.

unit.description: The unit of measurement used for the weight of the Shipment.

declaredWeight.description: The weight used for billing purposes to charge your customer.

unit.description: The unit of measurement used for the weight of the Shipment.

cod.description: Represents a monetary value including the currency and amount. For a full list of currency codes www.iso.org/iso-4217-currency-codes.html

currencyCode.description: The three-letter ISO currency code. Must be exactly 3 characters long and must be a valid currency code as defined by the system.

amount.description: The amount of money, expressed as a decimal value. Must be 0 or more.

customs.description: Represents a monetary value including the currency and amount. For a full list of currency codes www.iso.org/iso-4217-currency-codes.html

currencyCode.description: The three-letter ISO currency code. Must be exactly 3 characters long and must be a valid currency code as defined by the system.

amount.description: The amount of money, expressed as a decimal value. Must be 0 or more.

deliveryCharges.description: Represents a monetary value including the currency and amount. For a full list of currency codes www.iso.org/iso-4217-currency-codes.html

currencyCode.description: The three-letter ISO currency code. Must be exactly 3 characters long and must be a valid currency code as defined by the system.

amount.description: The amount of money, expressed as a decimal value. Must be 0 or more.

numberOfPieces.description: The total count of individual items or packages in the shipment.

pickupDate.description: The date on which the shipment was collected.

deliveryStatus.description: The current status of the shipment.

deliveryDate.description: The date on which the shipment was actually delivered.

shippingType.description: Specifies whether the shipment is Domestic or International.

productCategory.description: Defines the shipment category, such as Documents and Non-Documents.

productType.description: Represents the service level of the shipment, such as Non-Priority, Standard, Priority, Premium, Same Day, Next Day, etc.

descriptionOfGoods.description: Provides a detailed description of the items in the shipment.

hsCodeDescription.description: Describes the goods based on the Harmonized System (HS) code, used for international trade classification.

dimensions.description: Represents the dimensions of an object, including length, width, height, and the unit of measurement.

length.description: Length must be greater than 0 and less than 99999.

width.description: Width must be greater than 0 and less than 99999.

height.description: Height must be greater than 0 and less than 99999.

unit.description: The unit of measurement for the dimensions. Must be exactly 2 characters and either "CM" or "IN".

example.hsCodeDescription: Mobile phones classified under HS code 851712

items.description: The details of the items contained in the shipment.
Represents the details of an individual item within a shipment.

description.description: A brief summary of the item's features or nature.

countryOfOrigin.description: The country where the item was manufactured.

quantity.description: The number of units of a specific item.

hsCode.description: The Harmonized System code used for classifying goods in international trade.

customsValue.description: Represents a monetary value including the currency and amount. For a full list of currency codes www.iso.org/iso-4217-currency-codes.html

currencyCode.description: The three-letter ISO currency code. Must be exactly 3 characters long and must be a valid currency code as defined by the system.

amount.description: The amount of money, expressed as a decimal value. Must be 0 or more.

unit.description: The unit of measurement used for the weight of the Shipment.

dimensions.description: Represents the dimensions of an object, including length, width, height, and the unit of measurement.

length.description: Length must be greater than 0 and less than 99999.

width.description: Width must be greater than 0 and less than 99999.

height.description: Height must be greater than 0 and less than 99999.

unit.description: The unit of measurement for the dimensions. Must be exactly 2 characters and either "CM" or "IN".

422.description: Unprocessable Entity - Shipment data validation failed.

post.summary: Creates an invoice for an existing shipment with the provided details.

requestBody.description: The shipment invoice details to create.

schema.description: Represents the invoice details for a shipment, including tracking number, chargeable weight, and charges.

trackingNumber.description: The unique tracking number associated with the shipment.

unit.description: The unit of measurement used for the weight of the Shipment.

charges.description: The list of charges associated with the shipment.

items.description: Represents a charge associated with a shipment or transaction.

type.description: The type of the charge. All applicable costs associated with the Shipment. Possible values are; Base Rate, fuel Surcharge, insurance, War risk, handling and packing fees, and other charges. It can not exceed 100 characters

amount.description: Represents a monetary value including the currency and amount. For a full list of currency codes www.iso.org/iso-4217-currency-codes.html

currencyCode.description: The three-letter ISO currency code. Must be exactly 3 characters long and must be a valid currency code as defined by the system.

amount.description: The amount of money, expressed as a decimal value. Must be 0 or more.

invoice.description: Represents the details of an invoice.

invoiceNumber.description: The invoice number of the shipment. Must not exceed 100 characters.

invoiceDate.description: The date and time of the invoice.

billingAccountNumber.description: The billing account number associated with the invoice. Must not exceed 100 characters.

billingAccountName.description: The billing account name associated with the invoice. Must not exceed 500 characters.

totalDiscountAmount.description: The total discount amount applied to the invoice. Must be 0 or more.

taxAmount.description: The tax amount applied to the invoice. Must be 0 or more.

totalAmountIncludingTax.description: The total amount including tax for the invoice. Must be 0 or more and greater than the TaxAmount.

currencyCode.description: The three-letter ISO currency code. Must be exactly 3 characters and valid.

Location.description: The URI of the created shipment invoice.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid shipment invoice details or validation errors.

422.description: Unprocessable Entity - Shipment invoice data validation failed.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong on the server.

currencyCode.description: The three-letter ISO currency code. Must be exactly 3 characters long and must be a valid currency code as defined by the system.

amount.description: The amount of money, expressed as a decimal value. Must be 0 or more.

unit.description: The unit of measurement used for the weight of the Shipment.

dimensions.description: Represents the dimensions of an object, including length, width, height, and the unit of measurement.

length.description: Length must be greater than 0 and less than 99999.

width.description: Width must be greater than 0 and less than 99999.

height.description: Height must be greater than 0 and less than 99999.

unit.description: The unit of measurement for the dimensions. Must be exactly 2 characters and either "CM" or "IN".

ShipmentInvoiceDto.description: Represents the invoice details for a shipment, including tracking number, chargeable weight, and charges.

trackingNumber.description: The unique tracking number associated with the shipment.

unit.description: The unit of measurement used for the weight of the Shipment.

charges.description: The list of charges associated with the shipment.

items.description: Represents a charge associated with a shipment or transaction.

type.description: The type of the charge. All applicable costs associated with the Shipment. Possible values are; Base Rate, fuel Surcharge, insurance, War risk, handling and packing fees, and other charges. It can not exceed 100 characters

amount.description: Represents a monetary value including the currency and amount. For a full list of currency codes www.iso.org/iso-4217-currency-codes.html

currencyCode.description: The three-letter ISO currency code. Must be exactly 3 characters long and must be a valid currency code as defined by the system.

amount.description: The amount of money, expressed as a decimal value. Must be 0 or more.

invoice.description: Represents the details of an invoice.

invoiceNumber.description: The invoice number of the shipment. Must not exceed 100 characters.

invoiceDate.description: The date and time of the invoice.

billingAccountNumber.description: The billing account number associated with the invoice. Must not exceed 100 characters.

billingAccountName.description: The billing account name associated with the invoice. Must not exceed 500 characters.

totalDiscountAmount.description: The total discount amount applied to the invoice. Must be 0 or more.

taxAmount.description: The tax amount applied to the invoice. Must be 0 or more.

totalAmountIncludingTax.description: The total amount including tax for the invoice. Must be 0 or more and greater than the TaxAmount.

currencyCode.description: The three-letter ISO currency code. Must be exactly 3 characters and valid.

unit.description: The unit of measurement used for the weight of the Shipment.

field.description: Field path that caused the error

correlationId.description: Unique request correlation ID for debugging
